verbs.description: Trump [V: has] taken steps to use a government agency as retaliatory weapon against a perceived American foe . Larry Kudlow does n't want to talk about it .
[ARG0: Trump] has [V: taken] [ARG1: steps to use a government agency as retaliatory weapon against a perceived American foe] . Larry Kudlow does n't want to talk about it .
Trump has taken steps to [V: use] [ARG1: a government agency] [ARG2: as retaliatory weapon against a perceived American foe] . Larry Kudlow does n't want to talk about it .
Trump has taken steps to use a government agency as retaliatory weapon against a [V: perceived] American [ARG1: foe] . Larry Kudlow does n't want to talk about it .
Trump has taken steps to use a government agency as retaliatory weapon against a perceived American foe . Larry Kudlow [V: does] n't want to talk about it .
Trump has taken steps to use a government agency as retaliatory weapon against a perceived American foe . [ARG0: Larry Kudlow] does [ARGM-NEG: n't] [V: want] [ARG1: to talk about it] .
Trump has taken steps to use a government agency as retaliatory weapon against a perceived American foe . [ARG0: Larry Kudlow] does n't want to [V: talk] [ARG1: about it] .
